Title: SharePoint Geographic Data Visualizer
Description: SharePoint Geographic Data Visualizer includes an Asp.Net server control and Microsoft Sharepoint web part which your users can use to visualize any data on a BingMap Silverlight Control. Library supports polygon background coloring and drawing different symbols on map.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight BingMap data visualizer control for location intelligence with Asp.Net & Sharepoint

Project Description
SharePoint Geographic Data Visualizer includes an Asp.Net server control and Microsoft Sharepoint web part which your users can use to visualize any data on a BingMap Silverlight Control. Library supports polygon background coloring and drawing different symbols on map.

Features

  • Ready to use data providers for SQL Server Database, Microsoft Sharepoint Lists and Microsoft Analysis Services, custom data providers supported.
  • Supports SQL 2008 spatial data type (Geography, Geometry).
  • Multiple layers supported. You can set which layer should be visible according to map zoom level.
  • Automatic / Range Based polygon background coloring and symbol type supported.
  • Simple expression based text / tooltips.
  • Mouse click events and customizable map data editor control.
